content:
{"name": "Pisgah Gospel Ministries Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Don't visit pantry without appointment.
Appointments can be made via the Plentiful App
Or by texting "PGM FOOD" to 726-879

People without an appointment have to wait until 11:30 a.m., and if they have any food left they will distribute it.", "email": "", "url": "pisgahgospelministries.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11 West Sandford Boulevard", "address_2": "", "city": "South Side", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10550", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8995004, "longitude": -73.83306150000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(914) 573-3915", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}]}
